# provider(_:timedOutPerforming:)

**Instance Method**

Called when the provider performs the specified action times out.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func provider(_ provider: CXProvider, timedOutPerforming action: CXAction)
```

## Parameters

- **provider**: The telephony provider.
- **action**: The action that timed out.

## Discussion

Depending on the action, a timeout may also force the call to end.

An action that has already timed out should not be fulfilled or failed by the provider delegate.

## Handling Call Actions

- **provider(_:perform:)**: Called when the provider performs the specified start call action.
- **provider(_:perform:)**: Called when the provider performs the specified answer call action.
- **provider(_:perform:)**: Called when the provider performs the specified end call action.
- **provider(_:perform:)**: Called when the provider performs the specified set held call action.
- **provider(_:perform:)**: Called when the provider performs the specified set muted call action.
- **provider(_:perform:)**: Called when the provider performs the specified set group call action.
- **provider(_:perform:)**: Called when the provider performs the specified play DTMF (dual tone multifrequency) call action.
- **provider(_:perform:)**: Called when the provider performs the specified set translation action.
